definition: to endorse/to support
to hold/to embrace/to wrap around/to gather around (sb)/to throng/to swarm/to support/Taiwan pr. [yong3]
to protect
supporter (person)

sentences.english: Will it receive heartfelt support from the people concerned?
sentences.chinese: 有没有得到有关人群发自内心的拥护？

sentences.english: One of its foremost proponents is the country's most bankable director, Feng Xiaogang.
sentences.chinese: 其中最著名的拥护者是在中国最卖座的导演冯小刚。

sentences.english: May scientists who supported the prodution of atomic bombs are advocates of peace.
sentences.chinese: 许多支持生产原子弹的科学家是和平的拥护者。

sentences.english: We should acclaim and support the heroic resistance of Feng Chih-an's troops.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该赞扬和拥护冯治安部的英勇抗战。

sentences.english: Start by empathizing and end by advocating.
sentences.chinese: 开口语气要中肯强调，结束要拥护支持。

sentences.english: We have fully embraced the Millennium Development Goals.
sentences.chinese: 我们全力拥护新前年的发展目标。

sentences.english: Ustinov later became a staunch6 advocate for UNESCO.
sentences.chinese: 乌斯季诺夫后来成为联合国教科文组织的坚定拥护者。

sentences.english: Loyalist forces using tanks and rockets outgunned the rebel groups.
sentences.chinese: 扎卡菲拥护者使用坦克和火箭重火力压倒了反对者。

sentences.english: Each of the several chief theories has its host of zealous partisans .
sentences.chinese: 那几种主要见解，每种都有许多热烈的拥护者。

sentences.english: Some advocates of the tax, however, eye broader benefits.
sentences.chinese: 然而，物业税的拥护者着眼于更宽的利益。

sentences.english: Federalists are convinced this will speed up European integration.
sentences.chinese: 联邦制拥护者相信这将加快欧洲一体化进程。

sentences.english: To get the support of the people, we must focus on addressing livelihood issues.
sentences.chinese: 要想得到人民群众的拥护，必须重视解决民生问题。

sentences.english: You are a vocal proponent for a cause.
sentences.chinese: 你成为了某一目标的口头拥护者。

sentences.english: Blue supporters claim that they poll well among military professionals.
sentences.chinese: 蓝营宣称他们的民调显示他们很受军队的拥护。

sentences.english: Support the international peace front and oppose the front of aggression of Germany, Japan and Italy.
sentences.chinese: 拥护国际和平阵线，反对德日意侵略阵线。

definition: to give one's allegiance/(popular) support
to love and respect/love and respect
not to enjoy popular support/to be unpopular
supporter (person)
to call/to appeal
to vow loyalty and devotion to
to change sides in a war/turncoat
to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
prestige
to show one's colors/to have a clear-cut stand (idiom)
to be loyal to
popular sentiment
to win the hearts of the people/to be popular among the masses
to issue a call for action/to raise one's hand and issue a rousing call (idiom)
to make a clarion call/to make a public appeal
that which is yearned for by the public
